greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, based on array described below.
comment: Form an array a(m,n) (n >= 1, 1 <= m <= n) by: a(1,n) = 2^(n-1) for all n; a(m+1,n) = (n-m)*floor( (a(m,n)-1)/(n-m) ) for 1 <= m <= n-1.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 22 2004
